WorkItem.ClosedComment: Thanks for reporting this! The issue has been fixed and can be tried out in the upcoming 0.9.5 release. We also have a beta available (https://typescript.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=TypeScript%200.9.5%20beta) if you'd like to try it out.
WorkItem.Summary: Declare does not work for enums

Comments.Message: Thanks for the report, you're right, we actually just noticed this the other day but it is not yet fixed. Marked as active.
